rows.label: qst202514_msg0001
rows.name:
Sorry for the wait, KOS-MOS RE: Re:.
This is what I wanted to give you.
It's a present!

rows.label: qst202514_msg0002
rows.name: This is for me?

rows.label: qst202514_msg0003
rows.name:
Listen, while I was observing you,
I noticed you didn't always have
perfect control of your power.

rows.label: qst202514_msg0004
rows.name:
It can't be easy to keep powers that
strong under control all the time.

rows.label: qst202514_msg0005
rows.name:
But if you use this device, it should
be much easier to manage.

rows.label: qst202514_msg0006
rows.name:
You'll be able to fight without worrying
about keeping yourself in check all the
time. I think it'll be really useful!

rows.label: qst202514_msg0007
rows.name: Astelle...!

rows.label: qst202514_msg0008
rows.name: Listen, KOS-MOS RE: Re:.

rows.label: qst202514_msg0009
rows.name:
Abilities as powerful as yours are
a very dangerous thing to have.

rows.label: qst202514_msg0010
rows.name:
But I think you probably have them
for a reason. The world needs that
kind of strength right now.

rows.label: qst202514_msg0011
rows.name:
King Serich and Emperor Nefer
both seem to think it's fine as long as
your Driver keeps you in check...

rows.label: qst202514_msg0012
rows.name:
But who wants to rely on a Driver
for everything, right?

rows.label: qst202514_msg0013
rows.name:
If you master the use of your own
powers, you can become the ultimate
Blade! Maybe even save Alst!

rows.label: qst202514_msg0014
rows.name:
Don't worry, I'm sure you'll do the
right thing. And I'm your best friend,
so I should know!

rows.label: qst202514_msg0015
rows.name: When did we become best friends...?

rows.label: qst202514_msg0016
rows.name:
You just keep supporting these guys
in their mission, OK, KOS-MOS RE: Re:?

rows.label: qst202514_msg0017
rows.name:
I have a feeling if you help Rex and
Nia and Meleph and my uncle, you'll be
able to save all of Alst someday!

rows.label: qst202514_msg0018
rows.name: Understood.

rows.label: qst202514_msg0019
rows.name:
Are you sure it is all right for me to
accept this for nothing, though?

rows.label: qst202514_msg0020
rows.name:
It's a gift from your best friend, right?
Sure you should accept it.

rows.label: qst202514_msg0021
rows.name:
Well, she's apparently your best friend!
Who turns down a gift from a bestie?

rows.label: qst202514_msg0022
rows.name:
When a good friend offers a gift,
you should accept it gladly.

rows.label: qst202514_msg0023
rows.name:
You two are good friends now, yeah?
Then you should accept her gift!

rows.label: qst202514_msg0024
rows.name:
Thank you, Astelle.
I promise to make good use of it.

rows.label: qst202514_msg0025
rows.name:
Thanks! Come by and visit
any time, OK?

rows.label: qst202514_msg0026
rows.name:
I promise I will visit.
We are friends, after all.

rows.label: qst202514_msg0027
rows.name: Best friends, you mean!
